pesticide.PPE: long-sleeved shirt and long pants, waterproof gloves, shoes plus socks; dust/mist filtering respirator meeting NIOSH standards of at least N-95, R-95 or P-95

Active_Ingredients.name: Bacillus thuringiensis subspecies israelensis Strain BMP 144 solids, spores and insecticidal toxins

Safety_Information.general_Info: Harmful if inhaled or absorbed through the skin. Avoid breathing spray mist. Avoid contact with skin, eyes or clothing. Wash thoroughly with soap and water after handling and before eating, drinking, chewing gum, using tobacco or using the toilet. Remove and wash contaminated clothing before reuse.
Safety_Information.if_On_Skin: Take off contaminated clothing. Rinse skin immediately with plenty of water for 15-20 minutes. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.if_Inhaled: Move person to fresh air. If person is not breathing, call 911 or an ambulance, then give artificial respiration, preferably by mouth-to-mouth, if possible. Call a poison control center or doctor for further treatment advice.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: Have the product container or label with you when calling a poison control center or doctor, or going for treatment.
